name: Match-3 (lurosset)
description:
This is a small project I made for practice.

It's one of those puzzle games where you must match 3 or more of the same kind of icon to remove it from the board and get points for that. Noteworthy examples of this puzzle "genre" are Bejeweled and Candy Crush Saga.

You can find the code for this game here on GitHub! I will update the executable here if any changes are made ;)
